@graph.name: Training - Helixer
@graph.description:
Structural genome annotation with Helixer

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Genome annotation with Helixer](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/genome-annotation/tutorials/helixer/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
